name: Cattender
description:
Small training and, at the same time, school project, made in Unreal Engine 4 in two days (actually, one day, because I spent the other one trying to understand how mouse clicks work in UE).
It was my first ever time using UE4, so there isn't really much in this game and it runs really, really bad, no matter the PC specs.

I'm just uploading it for preservation purposes, I don't recommend playing it.
No, seriously.

How to play:
Click on different ingredients to throw them into the cauldron.
Then click on the ladle to mix them up and see the results.

Art made by Kordian.
